mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tab_model (uuid, create_acc_uuid, create_date, modify_acc_uuid, modify_date, audit, audit_acc_uuid, audit_date, release_acc_uuid, release_date, one_level_classify, two_level_classify) VALUES (#{modelUuid}, #{createAccUuid}, #{createDate}, #{modifyAccUuid}, #{modifyDate}, #{audit}, #{auditAccUuid},#{auditDate}, #{releaseAccUuid}, #{releaseDate}, #{oneLevelClassify}, #{towLevelClassify})
mapper.update:
UPDATE tab_model
modify_acc_uuid =#{modifyAccUuid},
modify_date =#{modifyDate},
audit_acc_uuid =#{auditAccUuid},
audit =#{audit},
audit_date =#{auditDate},
release_acc_uuid =#{releaseAccUuid},
release_date =#{releaseDate},
one_level_classify =#{oneLevelClassify},
two_level_classify =#{towLevelClassify},
WHERE uuid = #{modelUuid}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM tab_model where 1=1 and uuid in
#{item}
